name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek argue with his father H.G. Tannhaus because he doesn't pay him enough attention.

name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and their daugther Charlotte leave tannhaus shop and take the car although it's raining.

name: Sonja Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and their daugther Charlotte leave tannhaus shop and take the car although it's raining.

name: Charlotte Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and their daugther Charlotte leave tannhaus shop and take the car although it's raining.

name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and little charlotte die in a car accident.

name: Sonja Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and little charlotte die in a car accident.

name: Charlotte Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and little charlotte die in a car accident.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Adult H.G. Tannhaus remembers his family.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: He wants to create a time machine to undo it all.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: He spends the next years building a time machine in the bunker.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Old H.G. Tannhaus finishes his machine...

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: ... and activates it.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Instead of saving his family, he splits and destroys his world, thus creating both Adam and Eve worlds.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas and Martha arrive in the origin world.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Jonas and Martha arrive in the origin world.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas and Martha persuade Marek not to drive over the bridge where the fatal accident would have occurred.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Jonas and Martha persuade Marek not to drive over the bridge where the fatal accident would have occurred.

name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek and his family return to Tannhaus' house. They live so H.G. Tannhaus never builds the time machine.

name: Sonja Tannhaus
description: Marek and his family return to Tannhaus' house. They live so H.G. Tannhaus never builds the time machine.

name: Charlotte Tannhaus
description: Marek and his family return to Tannhaus' house. They live so H.G. Tannhaus never builds the time machine.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: H.G. Tannhaus world remains, but Adam and Eve's worlds - and all of their inhabitants - cease to exist.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas and Martha hold hands as they watch each other disappear.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Jonas and Martha hold hands as they watch each other disappear.
